Text.Page:
[:

{@linkcreature:183#7001#Gaderong}, the master of the Celestial Arena, has been asking about you. He has recently opened the arena and is seeking proven champions to demonstrate it...for a suitable reward.

If you are interested, seek him out in Highwatch.

......

Oh! Yes, you're on my list! Welcome!

I'm trying to generate interest in my new arena, and having someone like you compete will certainly draw a crowd! Interested?
